can I add a ISO to software sources ?
Ya, use apt-cdrom. alternate cd can be used this way but not livecd. depends on contents
apt-cdrom seems to just unmount the dir
usually apt-cdrom will prompt you for cds to put in and register into sources.list. then it looks there for repos etc etc
How do i "put in" a ISO ?

Good question :) I think I'd loopmount it. If you have no /dev/cdrom1 then you can do something like mkdir /tmp/iso;mount -o loop /pathtoisofile/isofile.iso /tmp/iso ; ln -s /tmp/iso /dev/cdrom1         then when it asks to insert a cd make sure the cd is mounted
